short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks traffic to .zip and .mov domains. That's it - nothing more, nothing less.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SImple extension that blocks traffic calls to .zip and .mov domains. Nothing to configure as that is all it does.

If you install and legitmately need to access a .zip or .mov domain, there is now a continue button to allow you to continue on a warning page that gives more feedback for users.

A future version may include a full whitelist feature.

Created as a quick workaround for .zip domain phishing.
